product_title: Reese High Waist Cutoff Denim Shorts
product_description: A relaxed high-waist fit and nonstretch cotton denim create plenty of vintage attitude on distressed shorts finished with ragged raw-edge hems.
product_details_and_care:
A relaxed high-waist fit and nonstretch cotton denim create plenty of vintage attitude on distressed shorts finished with ragged raw-edge hems.
